docs.snippet: In an important step, a Senate committee has voted to let Veterans Affairs doctors sign recommendation forms for medical marijuana....
docs.abstract: In an important step, a Senate committee has voted to let Veterans Affairs doctors sign recommendation forms for medical marijuana.

headline.main: Rape on U.S. University Campuses Reaches 'Epidemic' Levels-Study
headline.print_headline: Rape on U.S. University Campuses Reaches 'Epidemic' Levels-Study

docs.snippet: More than 18 percent of female students at one U.S. university reported incidents of rape or attempted rape during their first year at the institution, according to a new study....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 18 percent of female students at one U.S. university reported incidents of rape or attempted rape during their first year at the institution, according to a new study.

headline.main: Senate Tries to Bridge Gaps on Domestic Surveillance
headline.print_headline: Senate Tries to Bridge Gaps on Domestic Surveillance

docs.snippet: The chairman of the Senate Intelligence Committee on Friday released his proposal for how to handle U.S. spy agencies' domestic surveillance authorities before they expire on June 1....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Senate Intelligence Committee on Friday released his proposal for how to handle U.S. spy agencies' domestic surveillance authorities before they expire on June 1.

headline.main: Gordon, Tristano, Johnson Voted Into Jazz Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: Gordon, Tristano, Johnson Voted Into Jazz Hall of Fame

docs.snippet: Saxophonist Dexter Gordon and pianists James P. Johnson and Lennie Tristano are the newest inductees into Jazz at Lincoln Center's Ertegun Jazz Hall of Fame....
docs.lead_paragraph: Saxophonist Dexter Gordon and pianists James P. Johnson and Lennie Tristano are the newest inductees into Jazz at Lincoln Center's Ertegun Jazz Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Dallas Girl Sentenced to 40 Years for Drowning Baby
headline.print_headline: Dallas Girl Sentenced to 40 Years for Drowning Baby

docs.snippet: A 14-year-old Dallas girl was sentenced by a juvenile court judge on Friday to 40 years in custody, the maximum punishment available, after admitting to drowning an infant in January, court officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 14-year-old Dallas girl was sentenced by a juvenile court judge on Friday to 40 years in custody, the maximum punishment available, after admitting to drowning an infant in January, court officials said.

headline.main: U.S. Director's 'Little Prince' Gets French Premiere at Cannes
headline.print_headline: U.S. Director's 'Little Prince' Gets French Premiere at Cannes

docs.snippet: The creators of the animated film "The Little Prince", which had its world premiere at the Cannes festival on Friday, knew they had to take extra care in adapting one of the most cherished works of 20th-century French literature for the screen....
docs.lead_paragraph: The creators of the animated film "The Little Prince", which had its world premiere at the Cannes festival on Friday, knew they had to take extra care in adapting one of the most cherished works of 20th-century French literature for the screen.

headline.main: Man Charged After Pushing Past Los Angeles Airport Security
headline.print_headline: Man Charged After Pushing Past Los Angeles Airport Security

docs.snippet: Prosecutors have charged a man who refused to cooperate with security officers at Los Angeles International Airport and was subdued with a stun gun....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have charged a man who refused to cooperate with security officers at Los Angeles International Airport and was subdued with a stun gun.

headline.main: The Latest on Waco Shooting: Biker Group Gets Proclamation

headline.main: Obama Reaffirms Commitment to Israel Security to American Jews
headline.print_headline: Obama Reaffirms Commitment to Israel Security to American Jews

docs.snippet: Seeking to shore up support from the Jewish community ahead of a June deadline to reach a potential deal to limit Iran's nuclear capabilities, President Barack Obama said his commitment to Israel was "unshakeable."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seeking to shore up support from the Jewish community ahead of a June deadline to reach a potential deal to limit Iran's nuclear capabilities, President Barack Obama said his commitment to Israel was "unshakeable."

headline.main: Houston Firefighter Dies in Apparent Murder-Suicide
headline.print_headline: Houston Firefighter Dies in Apparent Murder-Suicide

docs.snippet: A firefighter who served 12 years with the Houston Fire Department and his girlfriend have been found dead in an apparent murder-suicide at their suburban Houston home, officials said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A firefighter who served 12 years with the Houston Fire Department and his girlfriend have been found dead in an apparent murder-suicide at their suburban Houston home, officials said on Friday.
